with pytest.raises(ValueError, message='Expected ValueError'):
    meal_maker.MakeMeal(150, activity_level=activity_level, goal=goal)
pytest.mark.xfail(raises=AttributeError)pytest.mark.parametrize('activity_level, goal', [('sedentary', 'w_l'), (
    'moderate', ''), ('very', 100), (50, 'weight_loss'), ('', 'maintenance'
    ), ('vry', 'weight_gain')])
